pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:2.8: For the rendering of dūsesuṁ as “raped”, see Appendix I: Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:2.16: “Group” renders sattha, often translated as “caravan”. Sp-ṭ 1.489: Satthoti jaṅghasattho sakaṭasattho vā, “Sattho: a sattha of travelers on foot or a sattha of carts.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:3.1.11: For the rendering of gāma as “inhabited area”, see Appendix I: Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:3.1.13: For a discussion of the yojana, see sugata in Appendix I: Technical Terms.
